name: Crude oil, at production
description:
No data are available for foreign extraction of crude oil. United States data was used to represent extraction by foreign producers., 
Important note: although most of the data in the US LCI database has 
undergone some sort of review, the database as a whole has not yet 
undergone a formal validation process.
Please email comments to lci@nrel.gov.

category.name: 2111: Oil and Gas Extraction
categoryPath: 21: Mining, Quarrying, and Oil and Gas Extraction

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Includes data for crude oil extracted from onshore and offshore wells.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: Data on different elementary flows come from different sources
processDocumentation.restrictionsDescription: All information can be accessed by everybody.
